Class Nokogiri::XML::Reader
In: lib/nokogiri/xml/reader.rb
ext/nokogiri/xml_sax_push_parser.c
Parent: Object

The Reader parser allows you to effectively pull parse an XML document. Once instantiated, call Nokogiri::XML::Reader#each to iterate over each node. Note that you may only iterate over the document once!

Methods

attr_nodes   attribute   attribute_at   attribute_count   attribute_nodes   attributes   attributes?   base_uri   default?   depth   each   empty_element?   from_io   from_memory   inner_xml   lang   local_name   name   namespace_uri   namespaces   node_type   outer_xml   prefix   read   state   value   value?   xml_version

Public Class methods

Create a new reader that parses io

from_memory(string, url = nil, encoding = nil, options = 0)

Create a new reader that parses string

Public Instance methods

attribute_nodes

Get a list of attributes for this Node

attribute(name)

Get the value of attribute named name

attribute_at(index)

Get the value of attribute at index

attribute_count

Get the number of attributes for the current node

attribute_nodes()

Get a list of attributes for the current node

attributes()

Get a list of attributes for the current node.

attributes?

Does this node have attributes?

base_uri

Get the xml:base of the node

default?

Was an attribute generated from the default value in the DTD or schema?

depth

Get the depth of the node

each() {|cursor| ...}

Move the cursor through the document yielding the cursor to the block

reader.empty_element? # => true or false

Returns true if the current node is empty, otherwise false.

inner_xml

Read the contents of the current node, including child nodes and markup. Returns a utf-8 encoded string.

lang

Get the xml:lang scope within which the node resides.

local_name

Get the local name of the node

name

Get the name of the node. Returns a utf-8 encoded string.

namespace_uri

Get the URI defining the namespace associated with the node

namespaces

Get a hash of namespaces for this Node

node_type

Get the type of readers current node

outer_xml

Read the current node and its contents, including child nodes and markup. Returns a utf-8 encoded string.

prefix

Get the shorthand reference to the namespace associated with the node.

read

Move the Reader forward through the XML document.

state

Get the state of the reader

value

Get the text value of the node if present. Returns a utf-8 encoded string.

value?

Does this node have a text value?

xml_version

Get the XML version of the document being read

[Validate]
